entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 11:04 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:04 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:04 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
